inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of multiple myeloma at any stage of disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: undergoing high dose chemotherapy and stem cell transplantation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ECOG performance status of </= 2 at study entry
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory test results within protocol-specified ranges
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All previous therapy not associated with peripheral blood stem cell transplant, including radiation, hormonal therapy, and surgery, must have been discontinued 4 weeks prior to treatment in this study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to take aspirin daily as prophylactic anticoagulation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject must have the minimum stem cell dose of 5.0 x 10^6 CD34+ cells/kg collected
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Females of childbearing potential must have negative pregnancy test within 24 hours of first prescription for lenalidomide and must commit to either continued abstinence from heterosexual intercourse or begin TWO acceptable methods of birth control
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of intolerance or resistance to lenalidomide
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The development of erythema nodosum if characterized by a desquamating rash while taking thalidomide or similar drugs.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known seropositive for or active viral infection with human immunodeficiency vrus (HIV), hepatitis B virus (HBV) or hepatitis C virus (HCV). Patients who are seropositive because of hepatitis b virus vaccine are eligible.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma, s/p allogeneic transplant with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and represents for malaise, weakness, and generalized body aching x 2 days.
